pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, September 25, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will virtually address the United Nations General Assembly. His remarks will be livestreamed at http://webtv.un.org/.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and hold a media availability. Minister of Public Services and Procurement Anita Anand, Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Theresa Tam, and Deputy Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Howard Njoo will be in attendance.

Room 225
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 1622050#

4:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister’s Youth Council.

Closed to media.
